content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-3.5, -0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (-3.5, -0.5)), boiler(position (-6.5, 0.0)) and offshore pump (position (-9.5, -0.5))
- Pipe group (fluid_system=3335, position=x=-8.5 y=-0.5) connecting offshore pump and boiler
- Pipe group (fluid_system=3230, position=x=-4.5 y=-3.5) connecting boiler and steam engine
- Electric pole group connecting steam engine to Assembling Machine 2

### Iron ore mine at position(15.5, 70.5)
Consists of electric mining drill(position (15.5, 70.5)) and a chest at position(15.5, 72.5)
- Belt group connecting electric mining drill and chest
- Burner inserter at position(14.5, 72.5) and burner inserter at position(17.5, 72.5)

### Copper ore mine at position(-45.5, 70.5)
Consists of electric mining drill(position (-45.5, 70.5)) and a chest at position(-45.5, 72.5)
- Burner inserter at position(-43.5, 72.5)

### Iron smelter at position(16.0, 75.0)
Consists of stone furnace(position (16.0, 75.0)) and an inserter at position(14.5, 75.5)
- Belt group connecting iron ore mine to iron smelter

### Copper smelter at position(-45.0, 75.0)
Consists of stone furnace(position (-45.0, 75.0)) and an inserter at position(-46.5, 75.5)
- Belt group connecting copper ore mine to copper smelter

### Iron gear wheel factory at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of Assembling Machine 2 at position(0.5, 0.5)

No new structures have been detected in the latest execution logs.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities at occupied positions
- Ensure the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity.
- Consider increasing the spacing or changing the direction when placing entities next to existing ones.

### Errors when connecting entities directly
- Transport belts cannot be connected directly from a chest object as a source. Add an inserter that takes items from the chest and use the inserter as a source entity.

### Errors due to lack of fuel or ingredients
- Ensure that furnaces and inserter have sufficient fuel.
- Ensure that furnaces have the required ingredients to smelt.

### Errors when extracting items from an entity
- Ensure that the entity contains the item you are trying to extract.
- Check the entity's inventory before attempting to extract entity.

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure that you have the required ingredients and crafting machines to craft the desired item.

### Errors when inserting items into an inserter
- Ensure that the inserter has the required items to insert.

### Errors when connecting transport belts
- Ensure that transport belts are connected correctly, with valid source and destination entities.

### Errors due to insufficient ingredients for crafting sub-components
- Ensure that you have the required ingredients to craft sub-components of the desired item.

### Errors due to lack of assembling machines
- Ensure that you have an available assembling machine to craft the desired item.

### Errors when attempting to insert items into an assembling machine
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory to insert into the assembling machine.

### Errors when extracting items from an assembling machine
- Ensure that the assembling machine has finished crafting the desired item before attempting to extract it.

### Errors when connecting pipes between entities
- Ensure that pipes are connected correctly between entities, with valid source and destination entities.
- Make sure none of the source or target connections points are blocked and the target is able to receive the fluid from the source.

### Errors due to invalid entity references
- Ensure that entity references are valid and correctly typed.

### Errors due to missing entity attributes
- Ensure that the entity has the required attributes before attempting to access them.

### New error tips from the latest execution logs
### Errors when attempting to connect pipes to an entity that is already connected
- Check if the entity is already connected to another entity before attempting to connect a pipe.

### Errors due to undefined names
- Ensure that all names used in the code are defined before they are used.

### Errors due to AttributeError
- Ensure that the entity or object being accessed has the required attribute.

### Additional error tips from the logs
### Errors when steam engine is not connected to power network
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to the power network.

### Errors when assembling machine
